DOC.brief_summary: The CommunityRx system generate patient-centered e-prescriptions community service ( HealtheRx ) via interface electronic health record ( EHR ) comprehensive community resource database . Based patient 's diagnosis , HealtheRx print automatically end ambulatory care visit provide patient customized map and/or list place community provide health social service well contact information local community health worker provide limit case management support . The CommunityRx program aim promote : 1 ) good healthcare , 2 ) good health , 3 ) low cost . The purpose research systematically evaluate impact CommunityRx health outcomes well health care service utilization total cost care Medicaid , Medicare beneficiary . The investigator hypothesize beneficiary participate CommunityRx intervention experience well healthcare , good health lower total cost care .
DOC.brief_title: Impact CommunityRx Program Health , Service Utilization Costs
DOC.criteria: Intervention group eligibility : Patients receive ambulatory care clinical site connect CommunityRx live CommunityRx geography . Control group eligibility : Patients receive care clinical site connect CommunityRx live outside CommunityRx geography . Patients receive care clinical site connect CommunityRx .
